attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to get out of europe.  belonging to the eu is a total waste of money (of which we spend billions) we have too many europeans coming into this country and because of our free education system and health and housing, we cannot afford them.  think of the uk like a lilo crowded with people when there should only be one on it.  it would sink, just like we are now.  we also seem to pick up all the criminals who are either attacking our population or costing us money in the justice system.  lastly the money they do actually earn is taken out of this country and not put back into it.  when will one of you complete fruitcakes in parliament actually act on this all too real problem which is drowning us.  why cant we be proud to have our own identity?  why are we forced into giving up all that is precious to us and being forced into adopting other countries ways of life to the detriment of our own.  this would not happen in any other country apart from us gullible lot.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
